channel.title: MadLab
channel.description:
[center][b][size=36pt]MadLab[/size][/b][/center]
[CENTER][URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/qk4y7ts8toky3mq/MadLab.jar]Download [/URL] [URL=http://madlabrsps.forummotions.com/]Forums [/URL][/CENTER]
MadLab is a 317 loading 667 data RSPS. It is currently in BETA mode and is constantly being updated.
My Goal for BETA: I am completely aware there are issues and I wish to use BETA so you (the players) can help me find these issues so I can *hopefully* fix them nice and swiftly.
Features: Loyalty system [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/dailyloyal_zps8e93f5cd.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/dailyloyal_zps8e93f5cd.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/loyaltyshop_zpsff4f04a6.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/loyaltyshop_zpsff4f04a6.png[/img][/URL]
Prestige system [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/prestigeshop_zpscbcb1596.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/prestigeshop_zpscbcb1596.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/rankorpoints_zpscc805029.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/rankorpoints_zpscc805029.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/prestiged_zps8cd1ee3a.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/prestiged_zps8cd1ee3a.png[/img][/URL]
Ancient Effigies - Effigy gfx: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/effigygfx_zpsb510ce52.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/effigygfx_zpsb510ce52.png[/img][/URL] - Total exp from 1 Effigy *4 stages* (showing that it isn’t overpowered) [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/xpeffigy_zps882bb93f.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/xpeffigy_zps882bb93f.png[/img][/URL]
Loads of NPCs to kill with some unique drops - [url=http://madlabrsps.forummotions.com/t5-monster-drop-guide-updated-9-8]Drop Guide[/url]
Good combat (I can’t show much, but here is some media): -Specs: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/ddsspec_zps0a256ec7.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/ddsspec_zps0a256ec7.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/clawspec_zpsdc5490d2.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/clawspec_zpsdc5490d2.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/agsspec_zpsa0f94529.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/agsspec_zpsa0f94529.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/korasispec_zps4bf269b4.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/korasispec_zps4bf269b4.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/saraspec_zps0d13ea85.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/saraspec_zps0d13ea85.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/vlsspec_zpsb23d7465.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/vlsspec_zpsb23d7465.png[/img][/URL] -Melee, Magic, and Ranged attacks: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/whipdef_zpsd0230b5c.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/whipdef_zpsd0230b5c.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/firespell_zps0f4a1c4b.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/firespell_zps0f4a1c4b.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/rangeshot_zps761cb22f.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/rangeshot_zps761cb22f.png[/img][/URL]
All skills working and always willing to improve (no Construction) [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/skillstab_zps9c143e5d.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/skillstab_zps9c143e5d.png[/img][/URL]
Custom skilling zones that are not overpowered (Sorry, but can’t really show the areas in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.) ;)
1 custom quest (more to be added in the future) [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j70aqdB__V0[/youtube]
Great home at Neitiznot/Jatizso (Sorry, but can’t really show the home in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.)
Minigames: Pest Control, Barrows, Duel Arena, Tz-Haar fight caves, and Warriors Guild! (Sorry, but can’t really show the minigames in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.)
And much more!
Random Media: Bank Tabs: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/banktabs_zpsd0bfaee8.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/banktabs_zpsd0bfaee8.png[/img][/URL] Slayer Shop: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/Slayershop_zpsbaddf78d.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/Slayershop_zpsbaddf78d.png[/img][/URL] Non-overpowered Starter kit: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/starter_zps1b04cd00.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/starter_zps1b04cd00.png[/img][/URL] Playing with a toy horsey (why not): [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/ToyHorses_zps2b1848a3.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/ToyHorses_zps2b1848a3.png[/img][/URL] Picture of whole screen (some people like to see it): [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/screen_zps17bac779.png.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/screen_zps17bac779.png[/img][/URL] Completionist Cape Emote: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/CompCapeEmote_zps8274a61e.gif.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/CompCapeEmote_zps8274a61e.gif[/img][/URL] Dungeoneering Master Cape Emote: [URL=http://s1296.photobucket.com/user/MadLabRsps/media/MasterDungEmote_zpsb9e79bb4.gif.html][IMG]http://i1296.photobucket.com/albums/ag5/MadLabRsps/MasterDungEmote_zpsb9e79bb4.gif[/img][/URL]
VPS info: 1GB Memory (Plan to upgrade to 2-3 later if necessary).
To see what I have done: [URL=http://madlabrsps.forummotions.com/t4-developer-s-log]Developer Log[/URL] [URL=http://madlabrsps.forummotions.com/f4-updates]Update lists[/URL] (Only covers recent updates as I wasn't making Update lists before then, Developer Log has that info) [CENTER][b]Updates (Starting 8/30/2013):[/b][/CENTER] [CODE] 8/30: Fixed auto-cache downloading problem Made many more fish edible including: Shrimp Crayfish Anchovies Cooked chicken Cooked meat Sardine Bread Herring Mackerel Cod Pike Bass and Rainbow fish Made a few more fish (from the list above that weren't already) Cookable Tweaked the xpcounter a little bit. Although xplock still doesn't work so will mark that down to do later.
8/31: Fixed Rapier attack styles, not sure if 100% right, but more accurate than what it was previously. Adjusted more NPC drops. Changed the NPC for the Prestige Shop to Sigbert the Adventurer. He has a good name for the role 8-) Added Chompy bird hats to the Loyalty shop (still want to add more to the shop, and to the pk shop but not sure what).
9/4: Changed Zeke NPC to Robe Store owner for the magic shop. Removed Obsidian cape from the armour shop. Made it so the 'goblin salute' emote sprite actually showed up instead of being a blank spot. Made every type of 'Small-obelisk' have the summoning restore effect.
9/5: Started work on a donator zone I think it will turn out nicely. Made all skillcapes 99k and the hoods 0gp so you can't buy the cape and hood for 99k then sell the hood for your 99k back. :d Moved a few things around here and there, not too noticeable, but makes the overall gameplay better. (personal opinion) Got rid of some unneeded code that was just making it sloppy and hard to read. Fixed a few errors given in the console while banking.
9/7: Added Relekka Slayer Dungeon NPCs and their drops. Fixed Giant Rock Crabs not being attackable.
9/8: Adjusted slayer shop prices so the items are actually reasonable to get, before you need to get over level 99 Slayer before you had enough points for even the lowest items. Adjusted the amount of creatures you have to kill for a slayer task, could of been in the 60s for any difficulty, now it is max 55 for easy, max 45 for medium, and max 40 for hard. Added tons of new possible Slayer tasks, with their correct slayer levels. Changed A Pro Miner quest a bit. Fixed Saradomin godsword's special and the Runecrafting animation. Added a new Farming shop, Martin the Master Gardener and made him pickpocketable. Adjusted more monster drops.
9/10: Put a Fairy Ring at home. Moved Max to Varrock and changed the way you get the Max cape. Added Completionist cape emote, it isn't perfect, but better than no emote. :p Also, made Dungeoneering master cape emote work, was already there but just 1 thing missing. Fixed a problem where it said "None" as the NPCs name in the drop guide. [/CODE]
Note: If there are any other images or more information you would be interested in seeing, please let me know and I will be happy to show what I can. Credits: DivineFate *base I used* Virtue Krithium *the makers of them as well*

item.title: MadLab
item.dc:creator: @MadLab MadLab
item.description:
@MadLab wrote:

LunarParadise:

This actually looks really good. Unique features, nice. Will definitely try out

Thank you.

Edited main thread with the links to my new forums, they are still free, but look way better my opinion than the previous forums.

Read full topic

This actually looks really good. Unique features, nice. Will definitely try out

item.title: MadLab
item.dc:creator: @MadLab MadLab
item.description:
@MadLab wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I meant for all the levels from 100-120.

It uses a formula, I would assume yes, but with my limited knowledge I can’t say for sure.

[quote=“MadLab, post:4, topic:529755”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648509.msg4361458#msg4361458 date=1378832851]

NPC name: None

what?
[/quote]

Lol I noticed that yesterday in the Drop Guide haven’t gotten the chance to look into it though. Will do it today or tomorrow.

And the bank tabs were a previously added thing, I did make a slight change in how it saves them in playersave but not sure where they are originally from.[/quote]

EDIT: I found out why it does that. The NPC id isn’t in the NPC config so it doesn’t know its name and by default names it ‘None’. So easy fix just have to find what NPCs have the problem then put them in NPC config.
EDIT2: Fixed. No more 'None’s

Read full topic

item.title: MadLab
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I meant for all the levels from 100-120.

Read full topic

item.title: MadLab
item.dc:creator: @MadLab MadLab
item.description:
@MadLab wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Is that true 120 Dungeoneering? With the correct xp.

Not sure if its correct xp but its over 100m exp for 120 Dungeoneering. I will look in a minute to find the exact xp you need for 120 since I don’t know it off hand.
EDIT: It is 104273166. So if that is correct or not let me know. Nvm…my best friend Google told that is the right exp.

Loveandpower:

[quote]NPC name: None

what?
[hr]
Decent advertisement good luck. Try to steer away from that bank tab guide on r-s if you used it, I HIGHLY suggest getting rid of it.[/quote]
Lol I noticed that yesterday in the Drop Guide haven’t gotten the chance to look into it though. Will do it today or tomorrow.

And the bank tabs were a previously added thing, I did make a slight change in how it saves them in playersave but not sure where they are originally from.

Read full topic

item.title: MadLab
item.dc:creator: @MadLab MadLab
item.description:
@MadLab wrote:

[center][size=36pt]MadLab[/size][/center]

[CENTER]Download
Forums [/CENTER]

MadLab is a 317 loading 667 data RSPS. It is currently in BETA mode and is constantly being updated.

My Goal for BETA:
I am completely aware there are issues and I wish to use BETA so you (the players) can help me find these
issues so I can hopefully fix them nice and swiftly.

Features:
Loyalty system

Prestige system


Ancient Effigies

  • Effigy gfx:
  • Total exp from 1 Effigy 4 stages (showing that it isn’t overpowered)

Loads of NPCs to kill with some unique drops

  • Drop Guide

Good combat
(I can’t show much, but here is some media):
-Specs:

-Melee, Magic, and Ranged attacks:

All skills working and always willing to improve (no Construction)

Custom skilling zones that are not overpowered
(Sorry, but can’t really show the areas in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.)

1 custom quest (more to be added in the future)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j70aqdB__V0[/youtube]

Great home at Neitiznot/Jatizso
(Sorry, but can’t really show the home in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.)

Minigames: Pest Control, Barrows, Duel Arena, Tz-Haar fight caves, and Warriors Guild!
(Sorry, but can’t really show the minigames in pictures. You just have to come and check them yourself.)

And much more!

Random Media:
Bank Tabs:

Slayer Shop:

Non-overpowered Starter kit:

Playing with a toy horsey (why not):

Picture of whole screen (some people like to see it):

Completionist Cape Emote:

Dungeoneering Master Cape Emote:

VPS info:
1GB Memory (Plan to upgrade to 2-3 later if necessary).

To see what I have done:
Developer Log
Update lists (Only covers recent updates as I wasn’t making Update lists before then, Developer Log has that info)
[CENTER]Updates (Starting 8/30/2013):[/CENTER]

8/30:
Fixed auto-cache downloading problem
Made many more fish edible including:
Shrimp
Crayfish
Anchovies
Cooked chicken
Cooked meat
Sardine
Bread
Herring
Mackerel
Cod
Pike
Bass
and Rainbow fish
Made a few more fish (from the list above that weren't already) Cookable
Tweaked the xpcounter a little bit. Although xplock still doesn't work so will mark that down to do later.

8/31:
Fixed Rapier attack styles, not sure if 100% right, but more accurate than what it was previously.
Adjusted more NPC drops.
Changed the NPC for the Prestige Shop to Sigbert the Adventurer. He has a good name for the role 8-)
Added Chompy bird hats to the Loyalty shop (still want to add more to the shop, and to the pk shop but not sure what).

9/4:
Changed Zeke NPC to Robe Store owner for the magic shop.
Removed Obsidian cape from the armour shop.
Made it so the 'goblin salute' emote sprite actually showed up instead of being a blank spot.
Made every type of 'Small-obelisk' have the summoning restore effect. 

9/5:
Started work on a donator zone I think it will turn out nicely.
Made all skillcapes 99k and the hoods 0gp so you can't buy the cape and hood for 99k then sell the hood for your 99k back. :d
Moved a few things around here and there, not too noticeable, but makes the overall gameplay better. (personal opinion)
Got rid of some unneeded code that was just making it sloppy and hard to read.
Fixed a few errors given in the console while banking.

9/7:
Added Relekka Slayer Dungeon NPCs and their drops.
Fixed Giant Rock Crabs not being attackable.

9/8:
Adjusted slayer shop prices so the items are actually reasonable to get, before you need to get over level 99 Slayer before you had enough points for even the lowest items.
Adjusted the amount of creatures you have to kill for a slayer task, could of been in the 60s for any difficulty, now it is max 55 for easy, max 45 for medium, and max 40 for hard. 
Added tons of new possible Slayer tasks, with their correct slayer levels. 
Changed A Pro Miner quest a bit.
Fixed Saradomin godsword's special and the Runecrafting animation.
Added a new Farming shop, Martin the Master Gardener and made him pickpocketable.
Adjusted more monster drops.

9/10:
Put a Fairy Ring at home.
Moved Max to Varrock and changed the way you get the Max cape.
Added Completionist cape emote, it isn't perfect, but better than no emote. :p
Also, made Dungeoneering master cape emote work, was already there but just 1 thing missing.
Fixed a problem where it said "None" as the NPCs name in the drop guide.

Note: If there are any other images or more information you would be interested in seeing, please let me know and I will be happy to show what I can.
Credits:
DivineFate base I used
Virtue
Krithium
the makers of them as well

Read full topic
